Name: Consent to Treat
ServerSideScript:
Class FormScriptEvents    
private sub OnCreate()
    theForm("chkFirstSignOff") = false
    name = theForm.execScalerSQL("select First + ' ' + Last from Contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.DataStore.OwnerObjectGuid.tostring & "'")
    ' theForm("Debug") = "exec cstm_FormRoutingTempReplacement @FormInstanceGUID = '" & theForm("__forminstanceguid") & "', @Subject = 'Consent to Treat Submitted from portal', @Description = 'Form Submitted for " & name & "', @FormDefinitionGUID = '" & theForm("__formguid") & "'"
    
    Pop()
    theForm("txtUserGroupGUID") = theForm.execScalerSQL("SELECT UserGroupGUID From UserGroup where UserGroupGUID = '" & TheForm.User.userguid.tostring & "' ")  
end sub
private sub OnLoad()
    Pop()
end sub
sub OnAfterSave()
    if theForm("chkFirstSignOff") Then
        On Error Resume Next
            name = theForm.execScalerSQL("select First + ' ' + Last from Contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.DataStore.OwnerObjectGuid.tostring & "'")
            subject = "Consent to Treat"
            Description = "Form Submitted for " & name & "."
            theForm.execScalerSQL("exec cstm_FormRoutingTempReplacement @FormInstanceGUID = '" & theForm("__forminstanceguid").tostring & "', @Subject = '" & subject & "', @Description = '" & Description & "', @FormDefinitionGUID = '" & theForm("__formguid").tostring & "'")
            theForm("Debug") = "exec true"
        Err.Clear      ' Clear any possible Error that previous code raised
        If Err.Number <> 0 Then
            Err.Clear             ' Clear the Error
        End If
        On Error Goto 0 
    end if
end sub
private sub OnSave()
    ' UpdateContact()
    Pop()
    theForm("chkAutoSend") = false
    theform("chkNested")=true  
end sub
  
private sub Pop()
    if theForm("chkFirstSignOff") = false then
        sql = theForm.execSQL("SELECT [first], [last], DOB, [Address], [Other Address] as OtherAddress, CASE WHEN DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, DOB, GETDATE()), DOB) > GETDATE() THEN DATEDIFF(YEAR, DOB, GETDATE()) - 1 ELSE DATEDIFF(YEAR, DOB, GETDATE()) END AS age, City, [State], [Zip code] as ZipCode, Phone, [Work Phone] as WorkPhone, [Mobile Phone] as CellPhone, [Email Address] as EmailAddress from contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.Datastore.OwnerObjectGuid.toString & "' ")
        If sql.Rows.Count>0 then
            for x=0 to sql.Rows.Count-1
                theForm("legalFirstName") = sql.Rows(x).Item("first")
                theForm("legalLastName") = sql.Rows(x).Item("last") 
                theForm("dateOfBirth") = sql.Rows(x).Item("DOB")
                theForm("age") = sql.Rows(x).Item("age")
                theForm("address") = sql.Rows(x).Item("Address")
                theForm("otherAddress") = sql.Rows(x).Item("OtherAddress")
                theForm("City") = sql.Rows(x).Item("City")
                theForm("State") = sql.Rows(x).Item("State")
                theForm("zipCode") = sql.Rows(x).Item("ZipCode")
                theForm("homePhone") = sql.Rows(x).Item("Phone")
                theForm("workPhone") = sql.Rows(x).Item("WorkPhone")
                theForm("cellPhone") = sql.Rows(x).Item("CellPhone")
                theForm("emailAddress") = sql.Rows(x).Item("EmailAddress")
            next       
        end if
    end if
	Dim contactGUID
	contactGUID = theForm.execScalerSQL("SELECT CAST(ContactGUID As varchar(36)) FROM PortalUsers WHERE ContactGUID = '" & theForm.DataStore.OwnerObjectGuid.ToString() & "'; ")
	 If IsNull(contactGUID) Or contactGUID = "NULL" Or Trim(contactGUID) = "" then
          theForm("chkIsPortalUser") = false
	Else
		theForm("chkIsPortalUser") = true
		If theForm("chkFirstSignOff") = false  then
            theForm("chkAutoSend") = true          
		end if      
	end if             
end sub
  
private sub UpdateContact()
      theForm.execScalerSQL("UPDATE contact SET Address = '" & theForm("address") & "', [Other Address] = '" & theForm("otherAddress") & "', " & _
		"City = '" & theForm("City") & "', State = '" & theForm("State") & "', [Zip code] = '" & theForm("zipCode") & "', Phone = '" & theForm("homePhone") & "', " & _
        "[Work Phone] = '" & theForm("workPhone") & "',[Mobile Phone] = '" & theForm("cellPhone") & "', [Email Address] = '" & theForm("emailAddress") & "' where cast(ContactGUID as varchar(36)) = '" & theForm.Datastore.ownerobjectguid.toString & "' ")  
end sub
  End Class

Public Module ConsenttoTreat

End Module
